About.title: About
About.textPart1: Even as a child, I was a bookworm, but it was only after my studies that I discovered
About.textPart2: myself. This allows me to quench my thirst for knowledge in the areas of technology, political science, philosophy, productivity, and personal development despite a hectic daily life. Over 70 audiobooks and 5 printed books per year provide me with a good pool from which I can make excellent recommendations. Most books are read or listened to in English. Exceptions are primarily made when German is the original language.
About.quote: Technology, science & politics nerd. Experienced tech-entrepreneur & AI expert. Impact driven. Convince people by action, not by words.
About.recommendToMe: I'm always grateful for book recommendations - just write me on
